data.title: Film Screening: Special event with Reza Ataran
data.text:
Hello folks,

This week session was originally intended for the proposal voting, however, due to the presence of Reza Ataaraan in the city, Na Ma Na session will be postponed to the next week. Instead, the film ‘No Men Allowed’ with the presence of Mr. Ataran will be screened.”No men allowed” a 2011 Iranian film is directed by Rambod Javan.

Is it worth watching?

1- We will have the main famous actor Reza Ataran among us;

2- The film is filled with funny moments and bolded with streotypes of Iranian society;

3- Forced to accept the presence of a new male teacher at a femalle highschool, the principal of school has to face new challenges…

Here is the link to the trailer: https://www . youtube . com/watch?v=0VG_Sbfv-uA

Film and year: No men allowed, 2011

Country: Iran

Director: Rambod Javad

Writer: Peyman Ghasemkhani

Casts: Reza Ataran, Vishka Ashayesh, Bahareh Rahnama, Pegah Ahangarani, Mani Haghighi, Falamak Joneidi
